sense.name: plan, 计划
sense.commentary: Amethod for doing or achievingt something, usually involving a series of actions or stages, or something you have arranged to do.
sense.examples:
制定计划 make a plan
指导性计划 guidance plan
指令性计划 mandatory plan

sense.name: project, 计划
sense.commentary: Apiece of planned work or activity that is completed over a period of time and intended to achieve a particular aim.
sense.examples:
研究计划 a research project
建筑计划 construction projects
粉刷里屋是他的下个计划. Painting the bedroom is his next project.
